name: Yassss
description:
Submission for the ScoreSpace Jam #6 

Yassss - yet another side-scroll-space-shooter

Theme: "Karma"

A side-scrolling shooter in which all of your moves & shots are logged. Once you reach the end (after 70 seconds), you will turn around and face your own bullet hell storm. Gain points for destroying enemies, loose points when you get hit.

All graphics, sound and code was created exclusive for the jam, during event time.

Sound / Programming: Jonathan Berg

Pixel Art: Maxim Wielgosinski
